title: Wacky Races
overview: Wacky Races is an American animated television series, a reboot of the 1968-69 Hanna-Barbera television series of the same name. It is the first Wacky Races television series without the original creators William Hanna and Joseph Barbera (who died respectively in 2001 and 2006) and also the first without the original voice cast.
